transcript.content: waiting time is too long at the pharmacy

Thank you for sharing this. I know situations like this can be stressful, and I'll make this as easy as possible.

To help us act quickly, please share a short but detailed description in one message (if you haven’t already). It helps to include:

• When it happened (date/time)
• Service or department (e.g., Emergency, Specialist Clinic, Surgery, Dialysis, Laboratory, Pharmacy, Ward)
• Who was involved (doctor, nurse, receptionist, etc.)
• What happened (the specific issue)
• How it affected you (e.g., stress, missed work, pain, extra cost)

Example:
"I had an appointment on 12 Jun at the Orthopaedic Specialist Clinic. My printed date showed 23 Jun instead. I spoke with the receptionist and was told to rebook. This caused me to miss half a day of work and reschedule my physiotherapy."

We apologize for the long wait time. To help us investigate and provide feedback, could you share:

• When did this happen? (date or "yesterday", "last week", etc.)
• Which service were you waiting for?
• How long did you wait?

Share what you remember - approximate details are fine. If you don't know, just say "don't know" and we'll move on.
happened on 21 jan 2025. i was waiting to get my medication. i waited for 4 hrs
Thank you for sharing this information. Would you like us to contact you regarding this complaint? (Yes/No)
yes
Thank you. To help us follow up with you, could you please share your name and email address?
mina, mina@gmail.com

Dear Mina, thank you for sharing your concerns about the waiting times at our pharmacy. We sincerely apologize for your experience and want you to know that your feedback will be carefully reviewed by our team. A member of our staff will follow up with you directly after a thorough investigation.

transcript.content: hi

Hello — I'm here to help with any concerns about your experience at Singapore General Hospital (SGH). I know this can be stressful, and I’ll make this as easy as possible.

To help us act quickly, please share a short but detailed description in one message. It helps to include:

• When it happened (date/time)
• Service or department (e.g., Emergency, Specialist Clinic, Surgery, Dialysis, Laboratory, Pharmacy, Ward)
• Who was involved (doctor, nurse, receptionist, etc.)
• What happened (the specific issue)
• How it affected you (e.g., stress, missed work, pain, extra cost)

Example:
“I had an appointment on 12 Jun 2026 at the Orthopaedic Specialist Clinic. My printed date showed 23 Jun 2026 instead. I spoke with the receptionist and was told to rebook. This caused me to miss half a day of work and reschedule my physiotherapy.”

Share whatever you remember, and we’ll fill in the rest together.
toilet was so hard to find

Thank you for sharing this. I know situations like this can be stressful, and I'll make this as easy as possible.

To help us act quickly, please share a short but detailed description in one message (if you haven’t already). It helps to include:

• When it happened (date/time)
• Service or department (e.g., Emergency, Specialist Clinic, Surgery, Dialysis, Laboratory, Pharmacy, Ward)
• Who was involved (doctor, nurse, receptionist, etc.)
• What happened (the specific issue)
• How it affected you (e.g., stress, missed work, pain, extra cost)

Example:
"I had an appointment on 12 Jun at the Orthopaedic Specialist Clinic. My printed date showed 23 Jun instead. I spoke with the receptionist and was told to rebook. This caused me to miss half a day of work and reschedule my physiotherapy."

Thank you for this feedback about our facilities. To help us investigate and provide feedback, could you share:

• What specifically was the issue? (e.g., noise, cleanliness, temperature, comfort, equipment)
• How did this affect your stay? (e.g., disrupted sleep, discomfort, health concern)

Share what you remember - approximate details are fine. If you don't know, just say "don't know" and we'll move on.
theres no sign to find the toilet.
Thank you for sharing this information. Would you like us to contact you regarding this complaint? (Yes/No)
Yes.
Thank you. To help us follow up with you, could you please share your name and email address?
Uh, my name is JoJo. e-mail is jojo123@gmail.com.

Dear JoJo,

Thank you for sharing your concern about the difficulty in locating the toilet—we understand how important this is for your comfort. Our team will review your feedback and follow up with you directly after a thorough investigation. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and are committed to improving your experience.
